entries.title: Zoom cuts 15% of staff in post-pandemic 'reset'
entries.description: The video call firm that surged in popularity during the height of Covid is cutting 1,300 people.

entries.title: Microsoft unveils new Bing with ChatGPT powers
entries.description: Bing will now have "answer" and "chat" options in search using the latest in artificial intelligence.

entries.title: Pye radio and TV sets go on display in Cambridge
entries.description: The film was founded in a garden shed and quickly became one of the biggest employers in Cambridge.
